name: Eternal Watchers
windowEffect: when a unit is destroyed, you may place it in your home system instead

name: Limited Presence
permanentEffect: You cannot have more than 2 sentinels on a single planet

name: Immovable Guardians
permanentEffect: Your ground forces cannot be removed or destroyed by action cards or agenda effects

name: Eon Beam
permanentEffect: At the end of each round of space combat, your infantry in the active system may use their space cannon abilities
